item.title: TrueNAS SCALE, iSCSI and K8s
item.description: Intro This is a simple guide meant to help you deploy the democratic-csi CSI Driver into your Kubernetes cluster via Helm, using TrueNAS SCALE as your storage backend for iSCSI volumes. NOTE: Assumes you have TrueNAS SCALE RC.1 or later Node Setup The TrueNAS team has put together steps for installing and configuring iscsi support for your nodes here. One word of caution is in order to use Multipath, you most have two NICs, on seperate physical subnets, and have multipath configured in TrueNAS.
